Flow.description: Creates a former position for a contact via a screenflow linked on the contact lighting page.

formulas.description: Sets the description of the icon element
formulas.name: fmDescriptionDeceased
formulas.expression: CASE({!fmUserLanguageCode}, "nl_NL", "Selecteer deze waarde als het contact is overleden. Het contact wordt op inactief gezet.", "en_US", "Select this value if the contact has deceased. The contact will be set to inactive.", "Select this value if the contact has deceased. The contact will be set to inactive.")

formulas.description: Sets the description in the icon element.
formulas.name: fmDescriptionNewJob
formulas.expression: CASE({!fmUserLanguageCode}, "nl_NL", "Selecteer deze waarde als het contact een nieuwe baan heeft.", "en_US", "Select this value if the contact has a new job.", "Select this value if the contact has a new job.")

formulas.description: Sets description of the icon element.
formulas.name: fmDescriptionRetired
formulas.expression: CASE({!fmUserLanguageCode}, "nl_NL", "Selecteer deze waarde als het contact met pensioen. Het contact wordt op inactief gezet.", "en_US", "Select this value if the contact is retired. The contact will be set to inactive.", "Select this value if the contact is retired. The contact will be set to inactive.")

formulas.description: Sets the correct description in the icon element.
formulas.name: fmIconLabelNewJob

formulas.description: Sets the label of the icon element.
formulas.name: fmLabelDeceased

formulas.description: Sets the label of the icon element.
formulas.name: fmLabelRetired

formulas.description: Sets the contact start date based on created date.
formulas.name: fmStartDateEstimatedContact

formulas.description: Extracts this user language code from the current user.
formulas.name: fmUserLanguageCode

Flow.label: Contact - SCFL01 - Create Former Position

loops.description: Loops all the former postions to update the contact.
loops.name: lpFormerPositions
loops.label: lpFormerPositions

recordCreates.description: Creates a former position for the deceased contact.
recordCreates.name: crFormerPositionDeceased
recordCreates.label: crFormerPositionDeceased

recordCreates.description: Creates a former postition related to the newly created contact.
recordCreates.name: rcFormerPositionNewJob
recordCreates.label: rcFormerPositionNewJob

recordCreates.description: Creates a former position based on the record that triggerd the flow related to the old contact.
recordCreates.name: rcFormerPositionOld
recordCreates.label: rcFormerPositionOld

recordCreates.description: Creates a former position for the retired contact.
recordCreates.name: rcFormerPositionRetired
recordCreates.label: rcFormerPositionRetired

screens.description: Double check if the contact needs to be set to deceased.
screens.name: dtCheckDeceased
screens.label: dtCheckDeceased

fields.name: dtDeceasedEN
fields.fieldText: You are about to categorize {!recordId.Name} as deceased. If correct, click on "Proceed" or go back to the previous screen to adjust your choice or click "Cancel" the operation.

screens.description: Double check if the contact needs to be retired.
screens.name: dtCheckRetire
screens.label: dtCheckRetire

fields.name: dtRetireEN
fields.fieldText: You are about to categorize {!recordId.Name} as retired. If correct, click on "Proceed" or go back to the previous screen to adjust your choice or cancel the operation.

fields.name: dtBackToFormerEmployer
fields.fieldText: Will the contact be employed by a previous employer of theirs? Choose 'Yes' to proceed or select "No" if you wish to choose a different account.

fields.name: dtCreateAccountEN
fields.fieldText: Provide all the required information to create a new account.

screens.description: Asks the user if the contact is no longer working for this organization.
screens.name: scrCreateANewPosition
screens.label: scrCreateANewPosition

fields.name: dtNewPostion
fields.fieldText:
To update the employment status of {!recordId.Name} at {!recordId.Account.Name}, you can choose from the following options:


  1. Register this contact with another company.
  2. Make note of a retirement.
  3. Set the contact to deceased.

Simply click on "Move Contact" and the options will be presented to you.


Please make sure you have all the required details prepared for this update.

fields.name: dtErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
ÔªøOops, something just went wrong. Please review the error message:


Error: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

Error Time: {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}


In the mean time we've already created a bug record. So your administrator has been noticed as well.

screens.description: Checks if a new account is needed for this new job.
screens.name: scrNewAccountNeeded
screens.label: scrNewAccountNeeded

fields.name: dtCreateNewAccountEN
fields.fieldText: Is the contact now working at a company that does not exist in Salesforce? When in doubt use the search bar below.

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Maak Nieuw Account aan","value":"Create Account","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand","iconName":"utility:company","index":0},{"label":"Koppel aan bovenstaand Account","value":"Use Existing Account","iconPosition":"left","variant":"brand-outline","iconName":"utility:company","index":1}]

fields.name: dtChooseOptionEN
fields.fieldText: Kindly choose the option that accurately represents the status of {!recordId.Name}.

fields.name: dtSelectBackToFormerEmployer
fields.fieldText: For which employer will the contact be working?

screens.description: Screen to setup the new role of the contact.
screens.name: scrSetupNewRole
screens.label: scrSetupNewRole

fields.name: dtContactInfoEN
fields.fieldText: Please provide the contact details for the new postion.

screens.description: Screen to setup the new role of the contact.
screens.name: scrSetupRole
screens.label: scrSetupRole

fields.name: dtContactInfo
fields.fieldText: Please provide the contact details for the new postion.

fields.name: scrSuccesNewPositionEN
fields.fieldText: You've successfully create a new position! Click on open record to view the contact.

fields.name: dtSuccesEN
fields.fieldText: You've successfully set the contact to inactive! Click on open record to view the contact.

subflows.description: This is a subflow to start the fault handling when a create / update / delete is giving an error. In this case a feedback record will be created.
subflows.name: subFaultConnector
subflows.label: subFaultConnector
